message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that you might be interested in. It's worth at least $15,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.  Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.
